byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

abstract: Pres Obama, speaking at White House news conference, attempts to assuage nation's fears after terror attacks by Islamic State unsettle nation; his job approval rating remains static despite extensive list of achievements reached while in office that include negotiating nuclear agreement with Iran, international climate accord and deals on budget, education and transportation.
lead_paragraph: A year that included an Iran agreement, a climate accord, a Pacific trade pact and a budget deal is nearing an end with President Obama seeing almost no change in his job approval rating.

headline.main: As Obama Checks Off List of Goals Met, a Nervous Nation Dwells on Terror
headline.print_headline: As Obama Checks Off List of Goals Met, a Nervous Nation Dwells on Terror

snippet: A year that included an Iran agreement, a climate accord, a Pacific trade pact and a budget deal is nearing an end with President Obama seeing almost no change in his job approval rating.
